title: Divine Smite
content: pecific feature that allows the Paladin to emanate divine might on their weapon as they strike, letting you deal additional radiant damage to your target. This spell can turn ordinary attacks into devastating blows, making it essential when dealing with enemies with larger Hit Points. Divine Smite is a unique spell since you can have it prepared at all times and you also have the ability to fully control it during combat.
